question: 賢い
sourceMnemonic: This is a single kanji with an <ja>い</ja> on the end, meaning you know it's probably an adjective. What's the adjective form of <kanji>clever</kanji>? It's <vocabulary>clever</vocabulary> or <vocabulary>intelligent</vocabulary>.
sourceReadingMnemonic: If you're <vocabulary>clever</vocabulary> enough, you can start up an awesome company that makes tons of cash. A <reading>cash co</reading> (<ja>かしこ</ja>).
